title: news.com.au — Australia’s leading news site | World News

items.title: Newly found Assyrian camp supports epic biblical account, expert says
items.content_html: A recent discovery may corroborate an epic biblical account of an angel of the Lord wiping out 185,000 soldiers, a scholar claims.
items.summary: A recent discovery may corroborate an epic biblical account of an angel of the Lord wiping out 185,000 soldiers, a scholar claims.

items.title: New York mobster ‘Tony Cakes’ identified as elderly pedestrian decapitated by city truck in grisly accident
items.content_html: An elderly man who met a horrific end on a public street in front of shocked onlookers has been identified as a prominent member of the Genovese crime family.
items.summary: An elderly man who met a horrific end on a public street in front of shocked onlookers has been identified as a prominent member of the Genovese crime family.

items.title: Two dead, eight hurt in US supermarket shooting

items.title: Tensions boil after third Korea border dispute
items.content_html: Seoul’s military said it had fired warning shots after North Korean soldiers briefly crossed the heavily fortified border in the third such incursion this month.

items.title: Aussie dies on religious pilgrimage
items.content_html: An Australian is among the hundreds of Muslim pilgrims who have died in Saudi Arabia while completing an annual pilgrimage to Mecca.

items.title: US’s wild new law on religion in schools

items.title: Landlord kills family of four after dispute

items.title: Sick anti-cop graffiti hits iconic union hall
